Milwaukee.Hart Park (Wauwatosa, Wisconsin): Hart Park is a 19.5-acre (7.9 ha) park on the Menomonee River in Wauwatosa, Wisconsin. Created in 1921 and originally known as City Park, it has a football field, baseball diamond, field house, several tennis courts. The football field is additionally utilized as the home field for the NCAA Marquette Golden Eagles lacrosse teams.
